author: claudep
message:
Removed with_statement imports, useless in Python >= 2.6. Refs #17965. Thanks jonash for the patch.


git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@17828 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37
